version_description:
Latest Updates:
- Search files, photos and links within your chat history
- Information on how group members joined a group now available to group owners
- Preview and edit selected photos before sending them to friends

Recent Updates:
- Improved voice input for faster and more accurate speech recognition (supports Mandarin Chinese)．
- Edit and annotate photos before sending them to friends
- Sticky articles you're reading to the top of Chats

Latest Updates:
- Search files, photos and links within your chat history
- Information on how group members joined a group now available to group owners
- Preview and edit selected photos before sending them to friends

- Improved voice input for faster and more accurate speech recognition (supports Mandarin Chinese)．
- Edit and annotate photos before sending them to friends
- Sticky articles you're reading to the top of Chats

Latest Updates:
- Edit videos before sending
- Disable alerts for likes or comments to Moments posts

- Preview and edit selected photos before sending them to friends

In this update
- Compatibility with iPhone X
- Filter your chat history for payment transactions
- Set a reminder to alert you later of a chat message

Latest updates
- Notes in Favorites can be formatted with bulleted and numbered lists, and notes can be set to Sticky on Top of the chat screen
- Generate your own tipping code and present to others to receive tips from other users (China-only)
- Improved chat history search experience
- A whole new design for iPad including an dual column layout

In this update
- Compatibility with iPhone X
- Filter your chat history for payment transactions
- Set a reminder to alert you later of a chat message

Latest updates
- Notes in Favorites can be formatted with bulleted and numbered lists, and notes can be set to Sticky on Top of the chat screen
- Generate your own tipping code and present to others to receive tips from other users (China-only)
- Improved chat history search experience
- A whole new design for iPad including an dual column layout

Latest Updates:
- Notes in Favorites can be saved as an image, making it easier to share to Moments.
- Sent a message with a typo? Recall the message and immediately edit your message.

Recent Updates:
- Compatible with iPhone X
- Edit videos before sending
- Disable alerts for likes or comments to Moments posts
- Search files, photos and links within your chat history
- Information on how group members joined a group now available to group owners
- Preview and edit selected photos before sending them to friends

Latest Updates:
- In "Settings"-"General", configure what features you want to appear in your Discover screen. 
- After logging in to a separate account on your mobile, quickly switch your log in to another account with a single tap.

Recent Updates:
- Edit messages immediately after recalling a message
- Compatible with iPhone X
- Edit videos before sending
- Disable alerts for likes or comments to Moments posts
- Filter searches for files, photos and links within your chat history
- Information on how group members joined a group now available to group owners
- Preview and edit selected photos before sending them to friends

Latest Updates:
- In "Settings"-"General", configure what features you want to appear in your Discover screen.

- After logging in to a separate account on your mobile, quickly switch your log in to another account with a single tap.

Recent Updates:
- Edit messages immediately after recalling a message
- Compatible with iPhone X
- Edit videos before sending
- Disable alerts for likes or comments to Moments posts
- Filter searches for files, photos and links within your chat history
- Information on how group members joined a group now available to group owners
- Preview and edit selected photos before sending them to friends

Latest Updates:
- In "Settings"-"General", configure what features you want to appear in your Discover screen.

- After logging in to a separate account on your mobile, quickly switch your log in to another account with a single tap.

Recent Updates:
- Edit messages immediately after recalling a message
- Compatible with iPhone X
- Edit videos before sending
- Disable alerts for likes or comments to Moments posts
- Filter searches for files, photos and links within your chat history
- Information on how group members joined a group now available to group owners
- Preview and edit selected photos before sending them to friends

Latest Updates：
- Save a Moments post as a draft for later editing

Recent Updates:
- In "Settings"-"General", configure what features you want to appear in your Discover screen.
- After logging in to a separate account on your mobile, quickly switch your log in to another account with a single tap.

Latest Updates:
- Hide articles or webpages and expand them later to view again

Recent Updates:
- Save a Moments post as a draft for later editing

What's new:
- Directly view messages from Subscription Accounts within newly designed Subscriptions folder.

Recent updates:
- Hide articles or webpages and expand them later to view again
- Save a Moments post as a draft for later editing
- In "Settings" -> "General" -> "Manage Discover", configure what features you want to appear in your Discover screen
After logging in to a separate account on your mobile, quickly switch your log in to another account with a single tap

What's new:
- Directly view messages from Subscription Accounts within newly designed Subscriptions folder.

Recent updates:
- Hide articles or webpages and expand them later to view again
- Save a Moments post as a draft for later editing
- In "Settings" -> "General" -> "Manage Discover", configure what features you want to appear in your Discover screen
After logging in to a separate account on your mobile, quickly switch your log in to another account with a single tap

What's new:
- "Voice Input" now supports English and Cantonese

Recent updates:
- Add frequently-used Mini Programs to "My Mini Programs"
- Directly view messages from Subscription Accounts within newly designed Subscriptions folder.
- Hide articles or webpages and expand them later to view again

What's new:
- Use your phone camera and record Selfie Stickers
- Long-press the text input bar in a chat to insert a new line in your message

Recent updates:
- Voice Input now supports instantly transcribing English, Mandarin Chinese, and Cantonese Chinese to text
- Directly browse articles from Subscription Accounts
- Use “Floating Window” to save an article for reading later

What’s New:
- Minimize notes in Favorites, document previews, etc. to a Floating Window.

Recent Updates:
- When sending a Time Capsule, search and attach a background song.
- Send a private comment within your friend’s Time Capsule.
- New methods supported to register and login to your WeChat account.

Whats New:
- Record a “Time Capsule” to chronicle the world through your eyes. “Blow a bubble” when viewing a friend’s Time Capsule to let your friend know you’ve opened it.
- A whole new design with clearer, more intuitive interface
- Configure an alert from a chat’s settings screen for a special alert when receiving a message

Recent Updates:
- From the stickers panel, create and send a Selfie Sticker
- Long-press the text input bar in a chat to enter a new line break

What's new:
- Use your phone camera and record Selfie Stickers
- Long-press the text input bar in a chat to insert a new line in your message

- Directly browse articles from Subscription Accounts
- Use “Floating Window” to save an article for reading later
